author: Ravi Teja
text:
I was reminded of my childhood when there were power cuts 3-4 times a day. Now the power distribution companies (DISCOMs) and the AP government (@YSRCParty)are gratefully reminding the people of its old days with gratitude 
@CMD_APEPDCL @ysjagan @BiswabhusanHC #PowerCutsInAP

author: Ravi Teja
text: There is an urgent need to strictly fix these accountabilities. You are therefore requested to strictly enforce the accountability of those discoms, so that people of AP are provided with immediate relief. @YSRCParty @BiswabhusanHC #PowerCutsInAP #26DistrictsInAP

author: Ravi Teja
text:
Dear Sir. 
@AndhraPradeshCM @ysjagan to look into the issue and ensure uninterrupted power supply for all 24hrs of the day. However, last few days many areas of the state are facing long power cuts. In this scorching heat,due to power cuts, people are facing extreme hardships.

author: Ravi Teja
text: I/We want to fortunately see @PawanKalyan Cheif Of  @JanaSenaParty to talk on unfortunate @ncbn @JaiTDP  and their cruelty in interrupting  the governance for their benefits and their cheap mentality and let everyone understand no to believe yellow flowers.

author: Ravi Teja
text: This is disgusting about the news on #YsVivekanandaReddy death in everyday newspapers. Reading in between the lines about the death Mistry, it’s understood very clearly, a narcissistic mind behind that news is triangulating it narcissistically.

author: Ravi Teja
text:
హరహర మహాదేవ శంభోశంకర. అందరకీ మహా శివరాత్రి శుభాకాంక్షలు .. 

When Shiva beats his DAMRU DAM DAM - Evil shakes and Wise Awakes. 

He is all and everything. He is the universe. 

May lord Shiva shower his benign blessings on you and everyone connected to you. https://t.co/w2vGEXsqbx

author: Ravi Teja
text:
A true leader helps his followers to grow. A true leader is you, an epitome of excellence. Happy birthday, @AndhraPradeshCM @ysjagan sir. I wish you the fulfilment of all the wishes lurking in the corners of your heart. 
#hbdjagananna #HBDManOfMassesYSJagan @YSRCParty https://t.co/b4dvLrr1dn

text:
